displaytitle: The Holy Family with the Infant St. John the Baptist and St. Elizabeth
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk, heightened with white, on cream laid paper
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
markings: Inscribed verso, lower left, in graphite on mat: 33; inscribed verso, lower center, in graphite on mat: Girolamo da Carpi; inscribed verso, lower right, in graphite on mat: Parmi/ Gi da Carpi

titles.title: The Holy Family with the Infant St. John the Baptist and St. Elizabeth

displaymaker: Attributed to Cristofano Gherardi, San Sepolcro 1508–1556 Florence | formerly Francesco Salviati, 1510–1563; born Florence, Italy; died Rome, Italy
caption: Attributed to Cristofano Gherardi (San Sepolcro 1508–1556 Florence), formerly Francesco Salviati (1510–1563; born Florence, Italy; died Rome, Italy), The Holy Family with the Infant St. John the Baptist and St. Elizabeth. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk, heightened with white, on cream laid paper; 24.3 × 17.3 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-13)

Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk, heightened with white, on cream laid paper; 24.3 × 17.3 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-13)
